property.name: caseFieldsToInclude
property.description: Provide the api names of the case fields you want to display as comma seperated values without using spaces
property.label: Enter Case Fields

property.name: accountFieldsToInclude
property.description: Provide the api names of the case.account fields you want to display as comma seperated values appending 'account.' without using spaces, i.e., account.Name,account.Phone
property.label: Enter Account Fields

property.name: contactFieldsToInclude
property.description: Provide the api names of the case.contact fields you want to display as comma seperated values appending 'contact.' without using spaces, i.e., contact.Name,account.Phone
property.label: Enter Contact Fields

property.name: sequenceOfFields
property.description: Provide the api names of the case/Account/Contact fields you want to display in sequence coloumn wise.
property.label: Enter Field Sequence

property.name: compoundFields
property.description: Provide the api names of any Address Compound fields used above.
property.label: Mention Address Fields
